  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectManager

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public boolean createProject(BTOProject newProject)
      Creates a new BTO project. Managers are allowed to create multiple projects even if their application dates overlap. This is an intentional design decision for flexibility in planning and scheduling.
      Parameters:
      project - The BTOProject object to create.
      Returns:
      True if the project creation is successful, false otherwise.

    • getProject

      public BTOProject getProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The BTOProject object if found, null otherwise.

    • editProject

      public boolean editProject(BTOProject project)
      Edits an existing BTO project.
      Parameters:
      project - The BTOProject object with updated details.
      Returns:
      True if the project update is successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(String projectName)
      Deletes a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the project deletion is successful, false otherwise.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public boolean toggleProjectVisibility(String projectName, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to toggle visibility.
      visible - The new visibility status (true for visible, false for not visible).
      Returns:
      True if the visibility toggle is successful, false otherwise.

    • getAllProjects

      public List<BTOProject> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects, regardless of visibility.
      Returns:
      A list of all BTOProject objects.

    • filterProjects

      public List<BTOProject> filterProjects(String filterCriteria)
      Filters projects based on the provided criteria (location, flat types, etc.).
      Parameters:
      filterCriteria - The criteria to filter projects.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOProject objects that match the filter criteria.

    • getProjectsByHDBManager

      public List<BTOProject> getProjectsByHDBManager(String hdbManagerId)
      Retrieves a list of projects created by a specific HDB Manager.
      Parameters:
      hdbManagerId - The ID of the HDB Manager.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOProject objects created by the specified HDB Manager.
